Hi,

On Thu, 2008-05-22 at 11:47 -0400, mike amundsen wrote:
> You might co=
nsider these options:
> 
> GET /categories/
> GET /categories/?filter=3Dpic=
tures
> GET /categories/pictures/
> GET /pictures/categories/
> 
> then thi=
nk about these:
> POST /categories/
> POST /categories/pictures/
> POST /pi=
ctures/categories/
> 
> The body you send around (POST and GET) may help cl=
ear this up, too.
> Is the "category" resource the same for all item types =
(same
> properties, etc) or is the property list different for some item
> =
types?
This is a good point. The categories for pictures have other propert=
ies
than categories for e.g. /products. Therefore I'd say it should be

/pi=
ctures/categories/

Thanx && cheers,
Martin

gories

ories:
